entry.title: Stanislaus Pizzaletto - New York Style Pizza Sauce - 100 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Stanislaus
Type: FOOD
Price: 9.49

Creating your signature pizza with pizza sauce and authentic Italian taste!

This sauce base provides the deep red color and a rich blend of tangy, sweet, and salty flavors your customers crave. Packed with high quality California vine-ripened tomatoes, extra-virgin olive oil, a blend of Italian seasonings, and fresh basil, this pizza sauce base has a smooth, velvety consistency that provides maximum spreadability. With the belief that quality products create quality customers, you can always rest assured you are serving the best.

Unbeatable Flavor

The tomatoes used to make this sauce experience minimal exposure to flavor-damaging heat to maximize the sauce's flavor profile. Plus, the tomatoes are packed fresh, and not from concentrate for maximum preservation of original flavor

Save Time in the Kitchen

It saves you most of the prep work in your high-volume kitchen while allowing you to add your own personal touch to your pizzas. Plus, its convenient bulk# 10 can size allows you to provide ample amounts of sauce at a time to your guest
